history.proof: intros. intros x. destruct x. - apply Some_le_def. apply H. - apply None_le_def.

exceptions.exn: Cannot turn inductive option_le into an evaluable reference.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
R: relation A

Goal:
Reflexive R -> Reflexive (option_le R)

Premises:
Reflexive = fun (A : Type) (R : relation A) => forall x : A, R x x : forall A : Type, relation A -> Prop Arguments Reflexive {A}%type_scope _%rel_scope
relation = fun A : Type => A -> A -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments relation _%type_scope
Inductive option_le (A1 A2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) : rel (option A1) (option A2) := Some_le_def : forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RA x y -> option_le RA (Some x) (Some y) | None_le_def : forall y : option A2, option_le RA None y Arguments option_le {A1 A2}%type_scope _%rel_scope Arguments Some_le_def {A1 A2}%type_scope _%rel_scope Arguments None_le_def {A1 A2}%type_scope _%rel_scope
rel_inter_refl : forall R1 R2 : rel ?A ?A, Reflexive R1 -> Reflexive R2 -> Reflexive (R1 /\ R2) where ?A : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type]
sum_rel_refl : forall (R1 : rel ?A ?A) (R2 : rel ?B ?B), Reflexive R1 -> Reflexive R2 -> Reflexive (R1 + R2) where ?A : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type]
prod_rel_refl : forall (R1 : rel ?A ?A) (R2 : rel ?B ?B), Reflexive R1 -> Reflexive R2 -> Reflexive (R1 * R2) where ?A : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type]
set_ge_refl : forall R0 : relation ?A, Reflexive R0 -> Reflexive (set_ge R0) where ?A : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type]
set_le_refl : forall R0 : relation ?A, Reflexive R0 -> Reflexive (set_le R0) where ?A : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type]
arrow_refl : forall (RA : relation ?A) (RB : relation ?B), Coreflexive RA -> Reflexive RB -> Reflexive (RA ++> RB) where ?A : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type]
rel_pull_refl : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (R0 : rel ?B ?B), Reflexive R0 -> Reflexive (R0 @@ (f)) where ?A : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type]
arrow_pointwise_refl = fun (T A : Type) (R : relation A) (H : Reflexive R) (x : T -> A) (a : T) => (fun H0 : R (x a) (x a) => H0) (H (x a)) : forall (T A : Type) (R : relation A), Reflexive R -> Reflexive (- ==> R) Arguments arrow_pointwise_refl {T A}%type_scope {R}%rel_scope
rel_union_refl_r : forall R1 R2 : rel ?A ?A, Reflexive R2 -> Reflexive (R1 \/ R2) where ?A : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type]
rel_union_refl_l : forall R1 R2 : rel ?A ?A, Reflexive R1 -> Reflexive (R1 \/ R2) where ?A : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type]
Setoid.Build_Setoid_Theory : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), Reflexive R -> Symmetric R -> Transitive R -> Equivalence R
ssrsetoid.compat_Reflexive = fun (A : Type) (R : relation A) (H : Reflexive R) => H : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), Reflexive R -> ssrclasses.Reflexive R Arguments ssrsetoid.compat_Reflexive {A}%type_scope {R}%rel_scope
option_rel_refl = fun (A : Type) (R : relation A) (HR : Reflexive R) (x0 : option A) => match x0 as o return (option_rel R o o) with | Some x => Some_rel_def R x x (reflexivity x) | None => None_rel_def R end : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), Reflexive R -> Reflexive (option_rel R) Arguments option_rel_refl {A}%type_scope {R}%rel_scope
list_rel_refl = fun (A : Type) (R : relation A) (HR : Reflexive R) (l : list A) => list_ind (fun l0 : list A => list_rel R l0 l0) (nil_rel_def R) (fun (a : A) (l0 : list A) (IHl : list_rel R l0 l0) => cons_rel_def R a a (HR a) l0 l0 IHl) l : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), Reflexive R -> Reflexive (list_rel R) Arguments list_rel_refl {A}%type_scope {R}%rel_scope
eq_subrel : forall R0 : rel ?A ?A, Reflexive R0 -> Related eq R0 subrel where ?A : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type]
reflexivity_rstep : forall (R0 : rel ?A ?A) (x : ?A), Reflexive R0 -> RStep True (R0 x x) where ?A : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type]
None_le : forall (R0 : rel ?A ?B) (y : option ?B), RIntro True (option_le R0) None y where ?A : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type]
Field_theory.R_setoid3_Reflexive : forall (R : Type) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> Reflexive req
InitialRing.R_setoid5_Reflexive : forall (R : Type) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> Reflexive req
InitialRing.R_setoid3_Reflexive : forall (R : Type) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> Reflexive req
InitialRing.R_set1_Reflexive : forall (R : Type) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> Reflexive req
InitialRing.R_setoid4_Reflexive : forall (R : Type) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> Reflexive req
Ring_theory.C_setoid_Reflexive : forall (C : Type) (ceq : C -> C -> Prop), Equivalence ceq -> Reflexive ceq
OrderedRing.sor_setoid_Reflexive : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> Reflexive req
RingMicromega.micomega_sor_setoid_Reflexive : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> Reflexive req
ZCoeff.sor_setoid_Reflexive : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> Reflexive req
Tauto.foldA : forall ACC : Type, (ACC -> ?AA -> ACC) -> Tauto.GFormula -> ACC -> ACC where ?TA : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type]
forall_rel : (forall (v1 : ?V1) (v2 : ?V2), ?E v1 v2 -> rel (?FV1 v1) (?FV2 v2)) -> rel (forall v1 : ?V1, ?FV1 v1) (forall v2 : ?V2, ?FV2 v2) where ?V1 : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type] ?V2 : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type] ?E : [A : Type R : relation A |- ?V1 -> ?V2 -> Type] ?FV1 : [A : Type R : relation A |- ?V1 -> Type] ?FV2 : [A : Type R : relation A |- ?V2 -> Type]
BinNat.N.eq_refl = Equivalence_Reflexive : Reflexive eq
PeanoNat.Nat.eq_refl = Equivalence_Reflexive : Reflexive eq
BinInt.Z.divide_reflexive = BinInt.Z.divide_refl : Reflexive BinInt.Z.divide

BinPos.Pos.eq_refl = Equivalence_Reflexive : Reflexive eq

BinInt.Z.eq_refl = Equivalence_Reflexive : Reflexive eq
Operators_Properties.clos_rstn1_trans : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x y z : A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_n1 A R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_n1 A R y z -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_n1 A R x z
Relation_Operators.rstn1_trans : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x y z : A), R y z \/ R z y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_n1 A R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_n1 A R x z
Coreflexive = fun (A : Type) (R : relation A) => forall x y : A, R x y -> x = y : forall A : Type, relation A -> Prop Arguments Coreflexive {A}%type_scope _%rel_scope
Tauto.GFormula_rect : forall P : Tauto.GFormula -> Type, P Tauto.TT -> P Tauto.FF -> (forall t : ?TX, P (Tauto.X t)) -> (forall (t : ?TA) (a : ?AA), P (Tauto.A t a)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.Cj g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.D g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> P (Tauto.N g)) ->...-> forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g where ?TA : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type]
Tauto.GFormula_sind : forall P : Tauto.GFormula -> SProp, P Tauto.TT -> P Tauto.FF -> (forall t : ?TX, P (Tauto.X t)) -> (forall (t : ?TA) (a : ?AA), P (Tauto.A t a)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.Cj g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.D g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> P (Tauto.N g)) ->...-> forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g where ?TA : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type R : relation A |- Type]
